ChatCompletions.document: 推荐使用 API Explorer 调用接口，见本文档顶部说明。该示例给出接口正常调用时的响应例子。
ChatCompletions.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: hunyuan.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ChatCompletions
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TopP": 1,
    "Temperature": 1,
    "Model": "hunyuan-turbo",
    "Stream": true,
    "Messages": [
        {
            "Role": "user",
            "Content": "计算1+1"
        }
    ]
}
ChatCompletions.title: 流式请求成功示例

ChatCompletions.document:
推荐使用 API Explorer 调用接口，见本文档顶部说明。该示例说明hunyuan-vision模型如何调用接口。

ImageUrl.Url 支持图片链接以及图片 base64 两种方式
jpeg 图片转 base64 示例 (其他图片格式注意修改为对应的 MIME 类型, 如 image/png, image/webp, image/bmp 等):

```python
import base64

with open("1.jpeg", 'rb') as image_file:
    encoded_image = base64.b64encode(image_file.read())
    print("data:image/jpeg;base64,"+encoded_image.decode('utf-8'))
```
ChatCompletions.title: 图片理解示例

ChatCompletions.document: 推荐使用 API Explorer 调用接口，见本文档顶部说明。该示例说明如何使用深度研究。
ChatCompletions.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: hunyuan.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ChatCompletions
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Model": "hunyuan-turbo",
    "Messages": [
        {
            "Role": "user",
            "Content": "黄金价格为什么上涨？"
        }
    ],
    "Stream": true,
    "StreamModeration": true,
    "EnableEnhancement": true,
    "SearchInfo": true,
    "Citation": true,
    "EnableDeepSearch": true
}
ChatCompletions.title: 深度研究示例

ChatTranslations.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: hunyuan.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ChatTranslations
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Model": "hunyuan-translation",
    "Stream": false,
    "Text": "Playing video games leads to lasting improvements in cognitive abilities.",
    "Source": "en",
    "Target": "zh",
    "Field": "游戏剧情",
    "References": [
        {
            "Type": "sentence",
            "Text": "Computer games are a perfect recipe for strengthening our cognitive skills",
            "Translation": "电脑游戏是增强我们认知能力的完美秘诀"
        }
    ]
}
ChatTranslations.title: 非流式调用翻译接口
